'desc': [u'

Vidal Sassoon Premium Base Care Shampoo (190 ml) Price: Rs.249

History talks of men and women with long and strong hair; for ages
column15: it was believed that the longer hair you had
column16: the more stronger you were as a person. There have been multiple properties that hair has been connected to over time and almost all cultures used hair to portray or project an image of themselves. Even in modern days
column17: people are judged by the kind of hairdos or hair that they have and you better start thinking about yours today. The Vidal Sassoon Premium Base Care Shampoo has been formulated to give you healthy and thick hair that will leave envious admirers wherever you go. Rough and unkempt hair speaks of bad hygiene and you need a good shampoo to nourish and smoothen your hair. Look no further because this special shampoo from Vidal Sassoon will do just that
column18:
leaving you with beautiful hair for all times.

\r\n

\r\n\tWhy spend a whole lot of money at the parlor to get a smoothened look and then come home and flat iron your hair all over again? Now you can get smooth
column19: softer and straighter hair with every use of this nourishing shampoo. Ideal for hair smoothening
column20: this shampoo will act on your hair strands right from the roots and will straighten out frizzy hair. Your hair cuticles will be smoothened and you will feel significant difference every time you run your fingers through your locks. When hair is smoothened
column21: you will notice that breakage and hair fall is reduced considerably because there is less damage caused while brushing or styling your precious hair. Ideal for men and women with all hair types
column22: this Premium Base Care Shampoo will gently look after your hair roots and strengthen them in the process of hair smoothening so that you can flaunt luscious strong hair all the time and win over hearts of onlookers. The shampoo boosts iridescence
column23:
so the shine and sheen of your hair captures the praise of many and you feel confident and elated.

\n
